items.title: Global trends, foreign investors key drivers for markets this week: Experts
items.description: Stock markets had a record-breaking rally last week, largely driven by the US Federal Reserve's rate cut

items.title: Overseas funds pile money into Indian stocks again as bull run extends
items.description: The surge in inflows is also a sign of investors' growing comfort with India's equity valuation

items.title: FPIs pump Rs 33,700 cr in Indian equities in Sept amid US rate cut
items.description: Foreign Portfolio Investors put in a net investment of Rs 33,691 crore into equities this month (till September 20)

items.title: Mcap of 6 of top-10 most valued firms jumps Rs 1.9 trn; Infosys tumbles
items.description: The combined market valuation of 6 of the top-10 most valued firms jumped Rs 1,97,734.77 crore last week, with ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank emerging as the biggest winners

items.title: Ex Sebi chief to head panel on ending monopolies in gas transmission
items.description: The other members of the committee include A K Purwaha, former chairman of Engineers India Ltd, Shaleen Sharma, former head of BG India, and Sanjay Sah of Deloitte

items.title: Smart money's new playground: SIPs close to hitting 100 million sweet spot
items.description: Based on folio addition data, most of the new SIP accounts are likely in sectoral, smallcap, and midcap funds

items.title: Street signs: All aboard investment fast track, global money in motion
items.description: Except for the muted debuts of Kross and Tolins Tyres, initial public offerings (IPOs) had a stellar run last week

items.title: Complaint against Sebi chief falls short of persuading us to probe: Lokpal
items.description: Hindenburg Research had in its report alleged that Buch and her husband had stakes in obscure offshore funds used in the alleged Adani money siphoning scandal
